column4: I have this problem with Ubuntu. I get his message when I try to install this package called gxine. I get this "c compiler cannot create executables in $PATH. What does this mean?
install build-essential, although gxine is available inthe ubuntu repositories
you need to enable the universe repository and then use synaptic to find and install gxine
ok, 'sudo aptitude install gxine'  (once you enable universe)
check that 'compile' factoid from ubotu then
